import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/NavBar.css' import SearchResults from '../lib/SearchResults' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const searchContext = React.createContext() const NavBar = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('') const history = useHistory() useEffect(() => { // console.log('the search term has changed :', searchTerm) }, [searchTerm]) const handleSearch = () => { const passedSearchTerm = searchTerm SearchResults(passedSearchTerm) history.push('/results') } return (
